General.Name: Shandong Linglong Tyre Co Ltd
General.Description: Shandong Linglong Tyre Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, develops, and sells tires in the People's Republic of China. It offers passenger light truck radial, bus radial, and off-highway tires. The company serves passenger cars, commercial, and construction machinery vehicles. It also exports its products to approximately 173 countries, such as Europe, the Middle East, the Americas, Africa, and the Asia-Pacific. Shandong Linglong Tyre Co., Ltd. was founded in 1975 and is based in Zhaoyuan, the People's Republic of China.
